result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí in árasán

result.html: Tá mé i mo chónaí in árasánI live in an apartment.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ċónaí in árasánI live in an apartment.

result.eng: I live in number three, High Street, apartment two.
result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí in uimhir a trí Sráid Mhór árasán a dó

result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ċónaí in uiṁir a trí Sráid Ṁór árasán a dóI live in number three, High Street, apartment two.

result.eng: Hello, I am your new neighbour, in apartment ten.
result.ga: Dia dhuit is mise do chomharsa nua in árasán a deich
result.orig: Dia dhuit is mise do chomharsa nua in árasán a deich
result.html: Dia dhuit is mise do chomharsa nua in árasán a deichHello, I am your new neighbour, in apartment ten.
result.ponchtml: Dia ḋuit is mise do ċoṁarsa nua in árasán a deiċHello, I am your new neighbour, in apartment ten.

result.eng: Are you still living in an apartment?
result.ga: An bhfuil tú fós i do chónaí in árasán

result.html: An bhfuil tú fós i do chónaí in árasánAre you still living in an apartment?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tú fós i do ċónaí in árasánAre you still living in an apartment?

result.eng: I am sharing an apartment with a friend of mine.

result.orig: Tá mé ag roinnt árasáin le cara liom

result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag roinnt árasáin le cara liomI am sharing an apartment with a friend of mine.

result.eng: What about coming to my apartment and watching television?

result.eng: I have an apartment in the cuty centre; it's great.

result.eng: Some ten years ago I got up from bed in a small apartment.
